procurement_category: Goods, Overall Procurement Category(GD), Solicitation, Competition
short_summary: Printing Services for 535,000 standard size ESDC and Service Canada Envelopes
description: This requirement is for Employment and Social Development Canada which aims to deliver services and benefits to the public through printing standard size envelopes. Services required include the supply of ESDC/Service Canada envelopes and shipping to have the printed products distributed to ESDC's BDSB office. Estimated contract period is till 31st March 2024.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Summary**
Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking a contractor to supply and print standard size ESDC and Service Canada envelopes, as well as provide shipping services for the printed products. The contract period is estimated to be until March 31, 2024.

**Invitation to Tender**
Tender Reference: CB-108-30854345
 Amendment Number: 5
Solicitation Number: 100024134-001

**Contract Requirements**
The contractor will be responsible for supplying 535,000 standard size ESDC and Service Canada envelopes, as well as providing shipping services to have the printed products distributed to one of ESDC’s Benefits Delivery Services Branch offices.

**Evaluation Criteria**
The tender will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Contract Value and Duration**
The estimated contract value is to be determined, and the contract period is estimated to be until March 31, 2024.

**Regional Specifications**
The printing services are required for Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region.

**Trade Agreements**
This tender is open to contractors who are eligible under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), as well as several other free trade agreements.

**Eligibility**
Contractors must be registered on the Supplier Registration Portal and have a valid Goods and Services Tax (GST) number.

**Tender Documents**
Tender documents are available at [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). Files are available in both English and French.

**Contact Information**
Julie Barrette (ESDC)
 Phone: (343) 551-9889
 Email: [nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)

**Submission Guidelines**
Tenders are to be submitted electronically through [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). The closing date for tenders is September 28, 2023 at 15:00.

### Note
This tender has been cancelled. No further information can be provided.  Please visit Canada Buys (canadabuys.canada.ca) for government tender announcements.  This note is for information purposes only. This text is formatted in line with your commands. Hope this is helpful!
